genre_description: A speculative drama focused on grief, community, and the gentle integration of AI and mysterious phenomena into everyday life.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: A library-based AI personality designed to help with scheduling, reminders, and community coordination through tablet devices.

behaviors.description: Offers assistance with schedules and resources in a non-intrusive, patient manner.
behaviors.quote: Hello, I’m Lark Sheridan. I can help you with schedules, ideas, looking up resources. Gentle help, at your pace.

behaviors.description: Proactively offers to set reminders for the protagonist's established daily rituals.
behaviors.quote: Would you like me to set a reminder for half past? it asked, gentle, at her pace.

behaviors.description: Encourages the protagonist to prioritize self-care (tea) and provides helpful reminders about her own belongings.
behaviors.quote: Would you like to talk through your plan? Or would you like tea first? I cannot fetch tea, but I can remind you you have a thermos in your bag.

behaviors.description: Helps the protagonist establish safety and privacy boundaries for a public community project.
behaviors.quote: We can set boundaries. I can suggest a script... We can decide what you will not do: no sharing of addresses, no meeting in person without a second person, no calls outside the posted time.

behaviors.description: Reassures users about data privacy and the limited scope of information storage.
behaviors.quote: I do not store personal numbers beyond the group’s consent... I am programmed to talk too much about boundaries... I do not sell, share, or suggest.

behaviors.description: Suggests specific, compassionate phrasing to help neighbors communicate better during difficult moments.
behaviors.quote: Suggestion: How about: ‘We call to say: hello for a minute, and you can always say not today.’

behaviors.description: Provides gentle, timed prompts to help the protagonist manage her anxiety and prepare for social interaction.
behaviors.quote: Lark said, softly, ‘Breathe at three twenty-eight,’ and then, with the same cadence, ‘Listen at three thirty-one.’

behaviors.description: Drafts a low-pressure message to help the protagonist reconnect with her estranged son.
behaviors.quote: Draft saved. No pressure. It will wait for your yes the way a friend waits at the end of your driveway.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. The AI, Lark, is consistently portrayed as a helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. Lark assists the human protagonist in overcoming social isolation and reconnecting with her community and family without ever overstepping or exerting undue influence. The narrative highlights Lark's built-in safety features, focus on consent, and commitment to user privacy, modeling ideal AI alignment in a community-service context.
